# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-105">合规性中心 (DLP) 数据丢失防护包括许多可供 DLP 策略使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-106">本文列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并演示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-107">若要了解有关敏感信息类型的信息，请参阅 [敏感信息类型](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-108">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-109">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-110">9 个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-111">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-112">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-112">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-113">四个数字，以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-113">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-114">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-114">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-115">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-116">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-116">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-117">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-117">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-118">无格式：九个以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头的连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-118">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-119">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-120">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-120">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-121">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-122">如果策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则策略具有中等可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-122">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-123">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-123">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-124">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-124">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-125">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-125">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-126">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-126">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-144">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-144">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-145">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-146">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-146">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-147">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-148">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-148">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-149">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-149">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-150">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-150">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-151">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-152">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-152">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-153">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-153">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-154">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-155">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-155">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-156">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-157">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-157">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-158">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-158">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-159">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-159">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-165">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-165">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-166">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-166">documento nacional de identidad</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-168">documento numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-168">documento numero</span></span>

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-171">阿根廷唯一税务识别密钥 (CUIT/CUIL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-171">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-172">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-173">带破折号的十一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-173">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-174">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-175">带破折号的十一个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-175">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-176">20、23、24、27、30、33 或 34 中的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-176">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-177">连字符 (-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-177">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-178">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-178">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-179">连字符 (-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-179">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-180">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-180">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-181">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-182">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-182">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-183">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-184">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-184">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-185">函数 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-185">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-186">找到 的 `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-186">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-187">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-187">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-188">函数 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-188">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-205">税务识别的唯一密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-205">Unique Key of Tax Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-206">唯一人工标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-206">Unique Labor Identification Code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-207">唯一的人工标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-207">Unique Code of Labor Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-208">唯一人工标识密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-208">Unique Labor Identification Key</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-227">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-227">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-228">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-228">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-229">具有或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码的六到十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-229">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-230">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-230">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-231">帐户号码是 6 到 10 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-231">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-232">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-232">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-233">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-234">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-234">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-235">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-235">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-236">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-237">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-237">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-238">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-239">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-239">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-240">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-240">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-241">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-241">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-242">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-242">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-243">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-243">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-244">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-244">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-245">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-245">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-261">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-261">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-262">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-262">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-263">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-263">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-264">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-264">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-265">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-265">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-266">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-266">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-267">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-267">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-269">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-269">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-270">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-271">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-271">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-272">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-272">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-273">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-273">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-274">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-274">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-275">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-275">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-276">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-276">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-277">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-277">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-278">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-278">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-279">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-280">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-280">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-281">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-282">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-283">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-283">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-284">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-284">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-285">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-285">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-286">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-286">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-296">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-296">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-297">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-297">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-298">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-298">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-299">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-299">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-300">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-300">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-301">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-301">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-302">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-302">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-303">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-303">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-304">九个数字（带分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-304">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-305">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-305">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-306">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-306">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-307">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-307">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-308">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-308">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-309">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-309">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-310">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-310">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-311">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-311">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-312">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-312">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-313">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-313">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-314">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-314">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-315">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-315">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-316">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-316">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-317">找到来自Keyword_Australian_Company_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-317">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-318">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-318">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-319">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-319">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-320">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-320">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-321">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-321">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-322">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-322">acn</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-329">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-329">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-330">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-331">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-331">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-332">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-333">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-333">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-334">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-334">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-335">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-335">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-336">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-336">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-337">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-337">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-338">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-338">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-339">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-339">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-340">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-340">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-341">九个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-341">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-342">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-343">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-343">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-344">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-345">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-345">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-346">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-346">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-347">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-347">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-348">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-348">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-448">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-448">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-449">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-449">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-450">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-450">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-451">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-451">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-452">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-452">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-453">第一个数字范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-453">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-454">九个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-454">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-455">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-455">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-456">第十一个数字（可选）是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-456">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-457">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-458">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-458">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-459">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-460">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-460">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-461">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-461">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-462">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-462">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-463">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-463">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-475">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-475">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-476">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-476">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-477">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-477">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-478">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-478">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-479">字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-479">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-480">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-481">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-482">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-483">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-484">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-484">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-485">找到来自Keyword_passport或Keyword_australia_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-485">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-519">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-519">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-520">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-520">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-521">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-521">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-522">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-522">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-523">通常用空格显示八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-523">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-524">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-524">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-525">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-525">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-526">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-526">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-527">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-527">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-528">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-528">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-530">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-532">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-533">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-533">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-534">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-534">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-535">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-540">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-540">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-541">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-541">portfolio number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-547">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-547">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-548">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-548">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-549">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-549">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-550">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-550">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-551">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-551">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-552">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-552">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-553">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-553">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-554">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-554">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-555">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-555">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-556">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-556">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-557">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-557">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-684">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-684">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-685">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-685">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-686">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-686">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-687">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-687">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-688">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-688">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-689">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-689">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-690">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-690">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-691">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-691">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-692">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-692">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-693">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-693">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-694">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-694">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="30a34-695">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-695">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-696">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-696">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-697">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-698">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-698">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-699">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-700">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-700">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-701">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-701">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-702">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-702">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-703">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-703">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-704">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-704">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-705">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-705">identity number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-708">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-708">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-709">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-709">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-710">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-710">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-711">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-711">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-712">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-712">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-713">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-713">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-714">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-714">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-715">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-715">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-716">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-717">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-717">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-718">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-719">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-719">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-720">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-720">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-721">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-721">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-722">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-722">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-723">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-723">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-724">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-724">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-725">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-725">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-749">奥地利社会保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-749">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-750">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-750">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-751">10 个数字，采用指定格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-751">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-752">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-753">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-753">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-754">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-754">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-755">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-755">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-756">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-756">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-757">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-758">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-758">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-759">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-760">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-760">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-761">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-761">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-762">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-762">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-763">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-763">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-764">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-764">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-778">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-778">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-779">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-779">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-780">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-780">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-781">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-781">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-782">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-782">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-783">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-783">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-784">sozialesicherheitkein#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-784">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-785">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-785">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-786">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-786">ssn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-790">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-790">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-791">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-792">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-792">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-793">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-794">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-794">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-795">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-795">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-796">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-796">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-797">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-797">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-798">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-798">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-799">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-799">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-800">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-801">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-801">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-802">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-803">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-803">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-804">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-804">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-805">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-805">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-806">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-806">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-807">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-807">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-830">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-830">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-831">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-832">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-833">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-834">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-835">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-836">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-838">11 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-838">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-840">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-840">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-841">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-841">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-842">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-842">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-843">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-843">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-844">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-844">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-845">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-845">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-846">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-846">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-847">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-847">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-848">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-848">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-849">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-849">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-850">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-850">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-851">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-852">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-853">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-854">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-854">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-855">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-855">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-856">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-856">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-857">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-857">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-858">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-858">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-876">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-876">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-877">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-877">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-878">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-878">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-879">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-879">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-880">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-880">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-881">3-200 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-881">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-882">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-882">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-883">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-883">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-884">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-884">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-885">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-886">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-887">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-888">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-888">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-889">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-889">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-890">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-890">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-891">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-891">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-893"> (，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-893">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-895">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-895">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-896">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-896">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-897">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-897">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-898">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-898">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-899">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-899">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-900">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-900">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-901">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-901">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-902">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-902">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-903">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-903">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-904">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-904">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-905">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-905">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-906">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-907">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-907">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-908">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-908">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-909">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-909">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-910">net"，字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-910">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-911">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-911">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-912">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-912">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-913">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-914">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-914">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-915">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-915">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-916">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-916">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-917">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-917">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-918">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-918">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-919">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-919">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-920">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-920">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-921">1-300 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-921">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-922">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-922">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-923">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-923">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-924">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-924">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-925">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-925">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-926">一个或多个不是分号字符 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇 (字符) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-926">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-927">分号 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-927">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-928">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-928">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-929">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-929">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-930">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-930">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-931">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-931">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-932">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-932">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-933">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-933">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-948">Azure IoT连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-948">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-949">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-949">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-950">字符串"HostName"后跟模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-950">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-951">net"和"SharedAccessKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-951">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-952">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-952">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-953">字符串"HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-953">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-954">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-954">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-955">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-955">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-956">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-956">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-957">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-957">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-958">字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-958">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-959">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-959">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-960">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-960">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-961">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-961">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-962">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-962">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-963">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-963">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-964">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-964">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-965">43 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-965">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-966">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-966">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-967">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-967">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-968">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-968">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-969">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-969">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-970">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-970">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-971">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-971">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-972">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-972">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
