## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1014">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1014">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1016">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1016">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1017">net"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1017">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1018">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1018">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1019">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1019">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1020">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1020">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1021">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1021">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1022">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1022">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1023">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1023">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1024">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1024">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1025">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1025">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1026">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1026">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1027">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1027">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1028">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1028">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1029">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1029">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1030">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1030">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1031">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1031">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1032">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1032">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1033">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1033">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1048">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1048">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1049">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1050">字符串"sig"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1050">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1051">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1051">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1052">字符串"sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1052">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1053">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1053">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1054">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1054">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1055">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1055">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1056">小写或大写字母、数字或百分号之间的 43-53 个字符的任意组合 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1056">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1057">字符串"%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1057">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1058">任何不是小写或大写字母、数字或百分号的字符 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1058">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1059">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1060">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1060">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1061">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1062">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1062">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1063">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureSAS查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1063">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1064">Azure 服务总线连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1064">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1065">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1066">字符串"EndPoint"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1066">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1067">net"和"SharedAccesKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1067">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1068">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1068">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1069">字符串"EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1069">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1070">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1070">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1071">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1071">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1072">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1072">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1073">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1073">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1074">字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1074">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1075">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1075">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1076">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1076">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1077">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1077">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1078">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1078">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1079">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1079">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1080">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1080">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1081">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1081">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1082">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1082">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1083">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1084">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1084">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1085">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1086">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1087">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1087">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1088">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1088">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1103">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1103">Azure storage account key</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1105">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1105">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1106">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1106">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1107">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1107">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1108">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1108">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1109">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1109">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1110">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1110">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1111">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1111">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1112">字符串"AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1112">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1113">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1113">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1114">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1114">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1115">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1115">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1116">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1116">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1117">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1117">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1118">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1119">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1119">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1121">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1121">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1122">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1122">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1123">正则表达式CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1123">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1124">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1124">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1130"> (，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1130">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1142">Azure 存储常规 (帐户密钥) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1142">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1143">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1144">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合，前面或后跟以下模式中列出的字符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1144">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1145">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1145">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1146">零到大于符号 (>) 、撇号 (') 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或数字符号 (#) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1146">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1147">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1147">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1148">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1148">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1149">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1150">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1150">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1151">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1152">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1153">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1153">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1154">比利时驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1154">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1155">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1156">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1156">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1157">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1158">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1158">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1159">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1160">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1160">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1161">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1162">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1162">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1163">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1163">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1164">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1164">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1297">比利时国家号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1297">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1298">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1298">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1299">11 个数字加上可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1299">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1300">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1300">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1301">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1301">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1302">YY 格式的六个数字和两个可选句点。出生日期的 MM.DD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1302">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1303">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1303">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1304">三个连续的数字 (男性为奇数，即使对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1304">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1305">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1305">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1306">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1306">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1307">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1308">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1308">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1309">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1310">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1310">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1311">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1311">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1312">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1312">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1313">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1313">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1314">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1314">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1315">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1315">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1316">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1375">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1375">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1376">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1377">两个字母后跟 6 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1377">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1378">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1379">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1379">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1380">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1381">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1381">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1382">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1382">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1383">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1384">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1384">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1385">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1386">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1386">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1387">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1388">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1388">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1389">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1416">比利时增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1416">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1417">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1417">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1418">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1418">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1419">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1419">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1420">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1420">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1421">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1421">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1422">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1422">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1423">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1424">12 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1424">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1425">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1426">12 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1426">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1427">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1427">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1428">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1428">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1429">数字 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1429">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1430">从 1 到 9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1430">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1431">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1431">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1432">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1432">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1433">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1433">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1434">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1434">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1435">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1436">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1436">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1437">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1438">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1438">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1439">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1439">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1440">找到来自Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1440">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1441">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1441">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1442">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1442">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1443">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1443">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1444">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1444">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1445">n？ tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1445">nº tva</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1447">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1447">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1448">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1448">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1449">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1449">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1450">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1450">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1451">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1451">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1452">btw#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1452">btw#</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1454">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1454">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1455">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1456">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1456">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1458">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1458">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1459">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1459">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1460">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1460">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1461">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1461">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1462">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1462">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1463">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1463">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1464">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1464">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1465">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1465">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1466">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1466">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1467">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1467">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1468">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1468">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1469">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1469">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1470">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1470">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1471">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1471">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1472">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1472">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1473">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1473">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1474">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1475">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1476">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1476">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1477">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1477">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1479">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1479">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1483">收入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1483">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1484">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1484">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1485">中年</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1485">Imposto</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1488">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1488">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1489">CNPJ (巴西法律实体) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1489">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1490">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1491">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1491">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1492">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1492">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1493">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1493">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1494">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1494">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1495">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1495">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1496">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1496">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1497">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1497">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1498">三个数字 (前八个数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1498">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1499">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1499">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1500">四位数分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1500">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1501">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1501">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1502">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1502">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1503">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1504">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1504">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1505">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1506">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1506">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1507">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1507">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1508">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1508">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1509">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1509">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1510">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1511">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1511">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1512">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1512">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1534">巴西国家身份证 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1534">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1535">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1536">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1536">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1537">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1537">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1538">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1539">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1539">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1540">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1540">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1541">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1541">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1542">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1542">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1543">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1543">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1544">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1544">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1545">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1545">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1546">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1546">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1547">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1547">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1548">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1548">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1549">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1549">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1550">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1550">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1551">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1552">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1553">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1554">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1554">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1555">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1555">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1556">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1556">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1557">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1557">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1559">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1559">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1562">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1562">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1563">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1563">número de rregistro</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1566">RG (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1566">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1567">RIC (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1567">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1568">保加利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1568">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1569">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1569">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1570">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1570">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1571">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1571">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1572">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1572">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1573">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1574">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1574">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1575">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1576">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1576">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1577">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1577">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1578">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1578">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1705">保加利亚统一编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1705">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1706">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1706">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1707">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1707">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1708">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1708">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1709">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1709">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1710">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1710">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1711">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1711">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1712">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1713">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1713">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1714">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1715">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1715">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1716">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1716">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1717">两个数字，对应于出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1717">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1718">对应于性别的一个数字：男性的偶数位数和男性的奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1718">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1719">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1719">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1720">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1721">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1721">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1722">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1723">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1723">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1724">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1724">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1725">找到 的  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1725">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1726">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1726">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1727">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1727">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1772">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1772">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1773">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1774">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1774">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1775">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1776">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1776">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1777">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1777">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1778">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1778">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1779">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1779">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1780">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1780">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1781">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1781">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1782">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1782">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1783">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1783">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1784">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1785">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1785">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1786">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1786">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1806">加拿大银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1806">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1807">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1807">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1808">7 个或 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1808">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1809">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1809">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1810">加拿大银行帐号是 7 个或 12 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1810">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1811">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1811">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1812">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1812">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1813">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1813">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1814">三个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1814">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1815">零"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1815">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1816">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1816">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1817">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1818">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1819">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1820">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1820">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1821">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1821">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1822">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1822">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1823">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1823">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1824">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1825">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1825">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1826">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1826">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1850">加拿大驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1850">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1851">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1851">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1852">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1852">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1853">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1853">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1854">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1854">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1855">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1855">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1856">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1856">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1857">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1857">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-1858">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1858">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1859">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1859">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1860">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1860">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1861">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1861">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1997">加拿大卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1997">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-1998">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1998">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="30a34-1999">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-1999">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2000">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2000">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2001">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2001">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2002">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2002">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2003">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2003">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2004">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2004">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2005">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2005">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2006">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2006">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2007">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2007">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2008">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2008">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2009">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2009">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2010">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2010">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2011">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2011">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2012">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2012">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2013">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2013">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2014">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2014">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2015">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2015">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2016">一些</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2016">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2017">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2017">workers compensation</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2019">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2019">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2020">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2021">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2021">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2022">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2022">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2023">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2023">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2024">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2024">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2025">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2025">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2026">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2026">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2027">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2027">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2028">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2028">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2029">找到来自Keyword_canada_passport_number或Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2029">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
