## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2059">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2059">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2060">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2060">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2061">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2062">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2062">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2063">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2063">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2064">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2065">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2065">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2066">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2067">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2067">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2068">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2068">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2069">至少找到了两个来自Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2069">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2070">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2070">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2071">Keyword_canada_phin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2071">Keyword_canada_phin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2074">income tax information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2074">income tax information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2075">manitoba health</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2075">manitoba health</span></span>

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2102">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2102">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2103">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2103">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2104">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2104">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2105">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2105">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2106">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2106">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2107">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2108">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2109">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2109">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2110">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2110">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2111">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2111">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2112">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2112">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2113">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2114">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2115">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2116">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2116">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2117">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2117">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2118">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2118">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2119">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2119">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2120">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2120">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2121">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2121">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2122">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2122">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2123">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2123">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2124">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2124">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2125">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2125">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2126">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2126">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2151">智利身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2151">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2152">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2153">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2154">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2154">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2155">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2155">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2156">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2156">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2157">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2157">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2158">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2158">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2159">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2159">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2160">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2160">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2161">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2161">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2162">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 一个数字或字母，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2162">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2163">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2164">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2164">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2165">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2166">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2166">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2167">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2167">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2168">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2168">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2169">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2170">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2170">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2171">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2171">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2172">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2201">唯一税务角色</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2201">Unique Tax Role</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2202">唯一的三元数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2202">Unique Tributary Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2203">唯一国家/区号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2203">Unique National Number</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2209">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2209">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2210">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2211">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2211">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2212">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2213">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2213">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2214">六个数字，表示地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2214">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2215">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2215">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2216">三个数字，表示订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2216">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2217">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2217">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2218">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2219">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2219">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2220">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2221">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2221">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2222">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2222">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2223">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2223">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2224">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2224">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2225">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2225">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2226">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2226">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2227">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2227">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2228">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2228">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2229">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2229">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2230">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2230">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2231">中国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2231">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2232">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2232">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2233">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2233">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2234">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2234">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2235">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2235">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2236">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2236">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2237">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2237">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2238">居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2238">居民 身份證</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2240">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2240">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2241">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2242">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (dddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2242">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2243">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2244">复杂而强大的模式，用于检测全球所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、MasterCard、Discover Card、JCB、American Express、名片和第三者卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2244">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2245">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2246">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2246">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2247">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2248">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2249">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2249">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2250">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2250">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2251">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2251">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2252">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2252">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2253">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2253">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2254">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2254">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2255">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2255">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2256">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2256">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2257">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2257">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2517">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2517">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2519">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2519">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2520">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2521">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2521">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2522">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2523">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2524">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2525">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2526">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2526">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2527">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2527">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2651">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2651">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2652">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2652">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2653">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2653">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2654">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2655">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2655">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2656">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2657">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2657">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2658">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2659">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2660">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2661">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2661">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2662">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2662">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2663">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2663">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2694">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2694">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2696">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2696">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2698">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2698">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2699">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2700">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2700">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2701">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2702">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2702">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2703">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2703">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2704">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2704">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2705">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2705">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2706">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2706">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2707">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2707">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2708">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2708">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2726">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2726">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2727">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2728">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2728">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2729">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2730">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2730">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2731">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2731">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2732">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2732">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2733">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2734">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2734">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2735">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2736">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2736">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2737">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2737">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2738">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2738">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2739">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2739">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2740">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2740">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2741">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2741">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2742">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2742">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2773">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2773">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2774">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2775">不带空格和分隔符的 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2775">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2776">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2777">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2777">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2778">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2779">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2779">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2780">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2781">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2781">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2782">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2782">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2783">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2783">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2908">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2908">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2909">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2909">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2910">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2910">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2911">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2911">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2912">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2912">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2913">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2913">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2914">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2914">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2915">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2915">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2916">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2916">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2917">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2917">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2918">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2918">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2919">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2920">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2920">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2921">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2922">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2922">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2923">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2923">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2924">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2924">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2925">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2925">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2926">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2926">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2927">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2927">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2928">标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2928">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2929">kim且 karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2929">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2930">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2930">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2931">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2931">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2932">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2932">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2933">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2933">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2934">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2935">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2935">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2936">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2937">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2937">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2938">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2939">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2939">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2940">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2941">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2941">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2942">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2942">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2943">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2944">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2944">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2945">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2945">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2946">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2946">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2947">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2976">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2976">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2977">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2977">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2978">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2978">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2979">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2979">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2980">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2980">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2981">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2981">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2982">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2982">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2983">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2984">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2984">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2985">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2986">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2986">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2987">"0"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2987">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2988">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2988">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2989">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2989">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2990">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2991">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2991">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-2992">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2993">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2993">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2994">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2994">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2995">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2995">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-2996">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2996">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-2997">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-2997">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3025">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3025">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3026">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3027">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3027">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3028">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3029">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3029">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3030">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3030">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3031">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3031">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3032">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3032">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3033">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3033">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3034">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3035">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3035">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3036">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3037">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3037">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3038">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3038">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3039">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3039">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3165">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3165">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3166">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3167">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3168">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3169">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3169">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3170">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3171">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3171">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3172">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3173">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3173">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3174">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3174">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3175">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3175">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3176">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3176">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3177">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3177">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3178">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3178">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3179">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3179">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3201">捷克个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3201">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3202">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3203">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3203">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3204">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3205">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3205">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3206">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3206">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3207">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3207">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3208">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3208">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3209">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3209">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3210">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3210">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3211">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3211">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3212">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3212">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3213">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3214">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3215">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3216">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3216">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3217">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3217">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3218">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3218">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3219">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3220">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3220">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3221">函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3221">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3222">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3269">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3269">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3270">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3271">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3271">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3272">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3273">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3273">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3274">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3275">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3275">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3276">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3277">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3277">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3278">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3278">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3279">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3279">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3403">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3403">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3405">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3405">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3406">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3407">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3407">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3408">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3409">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3409">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3410">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3411">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3412">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3412">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3413">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3414">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 找到的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3415">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3416">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3416">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3417">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3437">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3437">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3438">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3439">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3439">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3440">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3441">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3441">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3442">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3442">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3443">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3443">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3444">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3444">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3445">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3446">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3447">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3448">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3448">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3449">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3449">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3450">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3450">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3451">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3452">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3452">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3453">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3453">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3454">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3454">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3526">管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3526">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3527">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3528">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3528">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3529">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3530">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3530">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3531">一个字母 (可能) 不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3531">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3532">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3532">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3533">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3533">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3534">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3535">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3535">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3536">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3537">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3537">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3538">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3538">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3539">找到的 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3539">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3540">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3541">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3541">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3542">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3542">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3543">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3544">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3544">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3545">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3545">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3546">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3546">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3547">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3547">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3548">一些强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3548">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3549">犯罪管制机构</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3549">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3550">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3550">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3551">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3552">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3552">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3553">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3554">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3554">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3555">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3555">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3556">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3556">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3557">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3558">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3558">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3559">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3560">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3561">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3561">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3562">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
