## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3688">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3688">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3689">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3690">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3691">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3692">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3693">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3694">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3696">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3696">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3698">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3698">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3699">一个数字，对应于性生活和年龄 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3699">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3700">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3700">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3701">三个数字，对应于同一日期出生日期的分隔人的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3701">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3702">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3702">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3703">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3704">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3705">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3706">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3707">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3707">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3708">找到 的  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3708">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3709">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3710">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3710">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3743">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3743">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3745">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3745">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3746">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3747">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3747">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3748">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3749">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3750">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3751">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3752">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3752">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3753">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3754">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3755">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3756">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3756">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3757">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3775">欧盟借记卡号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3775">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3776">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3777">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3777">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3778">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3779">复杂而可靠的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3779">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3780">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3781">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3781">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-3782">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-3783">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3783">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3784">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3784">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3785">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3785">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3786">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3786">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3787">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3788">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3788">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3789">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3789">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3790">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3790">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-3791">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-3791">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4238">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4238">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4239">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4240">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4241">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4242">10 个数字，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4242">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4243">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4243">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4244">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4244">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4245">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4245">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4246">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4246">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4248">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4250">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4251">正则表达式查找  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4251">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4252">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4383">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4383">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4384">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4384">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4385">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4385">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4386">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4386">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4387">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4387">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4388">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4388">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4389">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4389">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4390">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4390">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4391">20 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4391">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4392">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4392">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4393">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4393">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4394">10 个数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4394">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4395">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4395">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4396">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4396">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4397">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4397">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4398">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4398">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4399">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4399">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4400">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4400">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4401">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4401">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4402">找到来自Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4402">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4420">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4420">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4421">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4422">六个数字加一个字符，表示一世纪加三个数字加一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4422">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4423">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4424">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4424">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4425">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4425">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4426">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4426">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4427">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4427">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4428">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4428">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4429">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4430">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4430">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4431">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4432">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4432">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4433">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4433">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4434">找到来自Keyword_finnish_national_id的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4434">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4435">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4435">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4436">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4437">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4437">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4438">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4438">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4487">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4487">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4488">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4488">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4489">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4489">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4490">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4490">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4491">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4491">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4492">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4492">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4493">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4493">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4494">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4494">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4495">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4496">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4496">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4497">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4498">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4498">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4499">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4499">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4500">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4500">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4501">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4501">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4502">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4502">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4503">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4503">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4504">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4504">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4517">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4517">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4518">suomalainen passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4518">suomalainen passi</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4528">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4528">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4529">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4529">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4530">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4531">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4531">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4532">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4533">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4533">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4534">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4535">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4535">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4536">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4537">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4537">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4538">函数Func_french_drivers_license查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4538">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4539">找到Keyword_french_drivers_license关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4539">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4667">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4667">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4668">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4668">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4669">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4669">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4670">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4670">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4671">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4671">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4672">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4672">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4673">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4674">21 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4674">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4675">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4675">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4676">21 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4676">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4677">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4678">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4679">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4679">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4680">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4680">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4681">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4681">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4682">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4683">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4683">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4684">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4685">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4685">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4686">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4686">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4687">找到来自Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4687">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4689">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4689">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4690">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4690">insurance card</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4693">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4693">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4694">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4695">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4696">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4697">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4697">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4698">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4699">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4699">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4700">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4701">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4701">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4702">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4702">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4703">找到来自Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4703">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4704">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4704">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4705">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4705">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4706">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4706">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4708">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4708">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4709">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4709">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4710">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4710">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4711">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4711">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4712">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4712">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4713">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4713">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4714">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4714">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4715">numéro d'assurance mal一e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4715">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4716">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4716">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4717">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4717">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4718">欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中提供了此敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4718">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4719">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4719">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4720">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4721">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4721">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4722">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4723">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4723">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4724">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4724">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4725">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4725">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4726">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4726">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4727">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4728">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4728">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4729">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4730">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4730">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4731">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4731">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4732">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4732">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4733">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4733">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4734">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4734">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4735">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4735">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4736">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4736">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4737">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4737">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4738">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4738">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4748">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4748">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4749">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4749">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4750">numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4750">numéro de passeport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4754">passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4754">passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4755">passeportnon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4755">passeportnon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4756">passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4756">passeportn °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4757">passeport français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4757">passeport français</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4758">passeport livre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4758">passeport livre</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4767">法国社会保险号码 (INSEE) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4767">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4768">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4769">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4769">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4770">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4771">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4771">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4772">13 个数字，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4772">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4773">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4773">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4774">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4774">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4775">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4776">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4776">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4777">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4778">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4778">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4779">函数 `Func_french_insee` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4779">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4780">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4780">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4781">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4781">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4782">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4782">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4783">函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4783">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4784">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4784">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4815">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4815">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4816">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4817">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4817">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4818">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4819">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4819">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4820">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4820">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4821">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4821">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4822">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4822">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4823">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4823">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4824">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4824">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4825">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4825">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4826">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4826">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4827">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4827">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4828">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4828">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4829">三个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4829">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4830">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4830">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4831">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4831">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4832">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4832">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4833">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4833">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4834">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4834">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4835">找到 的  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4835">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4836">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4836">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4837">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4837">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4850">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4850">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4851">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4851">taxno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4854">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4854">tin id</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4857">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4857">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4858">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4858">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4859">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4859">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4860">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4860">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4861">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4861">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4862">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4862">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4863">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4863">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4864">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4865">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4865">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4866">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4867">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4867">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4868">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4868">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4869">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4869">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4870">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4870">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4871">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4872">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4873">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4874">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4874">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4875">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4875">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4876">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4876">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4877">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4877">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4878">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4878">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4879">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4879">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4880">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4880">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4881">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4881">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4882">找到来自Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4882">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4883">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4883">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4884">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4884">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4897">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4897">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4898">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4898">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4899">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4899">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4900">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4901">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4901">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4902">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4903">11 个数字和字母 (不区分) 大小写：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4903">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4904">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4904">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4905">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4905">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4906">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4906">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4907">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4907">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4908">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4908">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4909">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4910">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-4911">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-4912">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4913">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4913">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4914">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4914">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-4915">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-4915">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5064">德国身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5064">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5065">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5066">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5066">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5067">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5067">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5068">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5068">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5069">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5069">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5070">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5070">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5071">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5071">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5072">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5072">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5073">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5073">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5074">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5075">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5075">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5076">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5077">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5077">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5078">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5078">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5079">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5079">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5080">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5080">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5081">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5081">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5082">aus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5082">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5083">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5083">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5084">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5084">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5085">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5085">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5086">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5086">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5087">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5087">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5088">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5088">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5089">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5089">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5090">个人 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5090">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5091">personalaus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5091">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5092">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5092">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5093">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5093">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5094">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5094">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5095">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5095">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5096">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5096">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5097">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5098">10 个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5098">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5099">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5100">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5100">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5101">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5101">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5102">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5102">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5103">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5103">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5104">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5104">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5105">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5106">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5107">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5108">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5108">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5109">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5109">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5110">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5110">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5111">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5111">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5112">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5112">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5113">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5113">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5114">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5114">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5115">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5115">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5138">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5138">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5139">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5140">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5140">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5141">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5142">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5142">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5143">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5143">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5144">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5145">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5145">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5146">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5147">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5147">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5148">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5148">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5149">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5149">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5150">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5150">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5151">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5152">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5152">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5153">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5154">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5155">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5155">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5156">找到 的  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5156">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5157">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5157">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5158">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5158">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
