## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5184">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5184">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5185">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5185">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5186">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5186">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5187">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5187">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5188">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5188">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5189">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5189">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5190">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5190">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5192">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5192">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5193">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5194">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5194">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5195">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5195">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5196">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5196">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5197">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5197">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5198">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5199">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5200">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5200">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5201">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5201">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5202">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5202">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5203">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5204">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5204">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5205">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5206">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5206">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5207">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5207">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5208">找到来自Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5208">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5209">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5209">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5210">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5210">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5211">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5211">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5212">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5212">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5213">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5213">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5215">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5215">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5216">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5216">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5217">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5217">mwst</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5219">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5219">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5220">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5220">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5221">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5221">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5222">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5223">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5223">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5224">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5225">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5225">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5226">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5227">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5227">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5228">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5229">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5229">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5230">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5230">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5231">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5231">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5357">希腊国民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5357">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5358">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5359">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5359">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5360">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5361">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5361">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5362">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5362">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5363">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5363">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5364">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5364">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5365">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5365">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5366">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5366">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5367">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5367">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5368">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5368">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5369">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5370">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5370">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5371">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5372">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5372">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5373">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5373">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5374">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5374">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5375">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5375">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5376">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5376">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5381">希腊语个人 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5381">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5382">希腊语政府 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5382">greek police id</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5387">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5387">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5388">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5389">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5389">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5390">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5391">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5391">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5392">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5393">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5393">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5394">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5395">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5395">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5396">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5396">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5397">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5397">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5398">正则表达式查找 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 8 月 19) 找到关键字 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5398">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5399">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5399">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5400">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5400">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5401">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5417">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5417">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5418">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5418">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5419">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5420">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5421">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5422">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5422">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5423">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5423">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5424">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5426">无空格和分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5426">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5427">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5428">6 个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5428">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5429">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5429">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5430">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5430">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5431">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5432">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5432">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5433">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5434">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5434">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5435">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5435">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5436">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5436">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5437">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5438">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5438">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5449">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5449">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5450">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5450">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5451">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5451">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5452">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5452">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5453">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5453">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5454">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5454">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5455">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5455">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5456">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5456">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5457">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5457">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5458">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5458">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5459">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5459">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5460">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5461">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5461">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5462">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5463">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5464">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5464">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5465">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5465">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5494">Hk Kong identity card (HKID) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5494">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5495">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5496">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5496">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5497">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5497">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5498">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5498">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5499">1-2 个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5499">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5500">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5500">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5501">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5501">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5502">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5503">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5503">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5504">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5505">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5505">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5506">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5506">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5507">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5507">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5508">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5508">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5509">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5509">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5510">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5510">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5511">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5511">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5551">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5551">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5552">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5553">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5553">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5554">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5555">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5555">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5556">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5556">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5557">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5557">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5558">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5559">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5559">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5560">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5561">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5562">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5562">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5563">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5563">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5688">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5688">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5689">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5690">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5691">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5692">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5693">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5694">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5696">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5696">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5698">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5698">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5699">1 个数字对应于性别 (1-男性、2-男性，对于在 1900 之前年龄的男性或具有双重公民关系) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5699">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5700">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5701">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5702">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5702">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5703">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5704">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5705">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5706">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5707">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5708">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5709">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5710">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5715">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5715">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5716">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5716">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5717">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5717">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5718">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5718">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5719">személyazonosító igazolv一y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5719">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5720">személyi igazolvméy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5720">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5721">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5722">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5723">两个字母后跟 6 个或 7 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5724">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5725">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5726">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5727">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5728">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5729">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5730">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5731">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5732">正则表达式查找 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5733">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5734">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5735">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5755">匈牙利社会保险号码 (TAJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5757">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5759">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5759">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5760">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5761">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5762">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5763">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5764">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5765">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5766">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5767">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5787">匈牙利税收标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5788">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5789">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5790">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5791">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5792">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5793">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5794">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5795">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5796">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5797">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5797">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5798">一个数字必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5799">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5800">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5800">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5801">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5802">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5802">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5803">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5804">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5805">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5806">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5807">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5808">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5834">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5835">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5836">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5837">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5838">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5839">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5840">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5841">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5842">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5843">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5844">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5845">两个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5846">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5847">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5848">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5849">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5850">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5851">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5852">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5853">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5854">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5855">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5856">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5856">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5857">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5857">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5858">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5858">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5859">增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5859">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5860">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5860">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5861">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5861">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5862">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5862">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5863">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5863">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5864">value added tax áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5864">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5865">kázósségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5865">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5866">által一os forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5866">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5867">hozzáadott一ték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5867">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5868">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5868">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5869">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5870">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5871">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5872">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5873">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5874">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5875">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5876">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5877">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5877">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5878">字母是字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5879">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5880">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5881">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5882">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5883">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5884">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5885">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5886">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5887">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5887">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5889">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5889">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5891">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5892">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5893">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5894">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5895">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5896">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5897">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5897">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5898">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5899">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5899">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5900">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5901">最后一个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5902">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5903">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5904">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5905">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5906">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5907">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5908">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5909">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5910">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5911">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5912">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5912">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5914">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5914">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5915">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5915">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5916">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5916">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5917">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5917">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5918">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5918">आधार</span></span>
