## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5920">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5921">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5922">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5923">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5924">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5925">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5926">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5926">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5927">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5928">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5929">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5930">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5931">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5931">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5932">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5933">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5934">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5935">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5936">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5937">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5938">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5939">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5939">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5941">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5941">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5944">国际银行帐号 (IBAN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5945">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5946">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5947">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5948">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5949">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5949">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5950">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5951">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5951">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5952">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5952">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-p137">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-p137">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5955">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5955">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5956">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5957">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5957">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5958">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5959">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5959">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5960">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5960">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5961">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5961">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5962">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5962">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5963">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5963">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5964">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5964">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5965">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5965">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5966">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5966">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5967">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5967">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5968">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5968">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5969">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5970">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5970">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5971">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5972">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5972">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5973">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5973">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5974">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5974">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5975">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5975">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5976">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5976">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5977">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5977">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5978">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_updated分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5978">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5979">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5979">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5980">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_codes分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 关键字词典的任何术语。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5980">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5981">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5981">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5982">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5982">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5983">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5984">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5984">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5985">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5986">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5986">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5987">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5988">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5988">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5989">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5990">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5991">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5991">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5992">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5992">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5993">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5994">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5994">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-5995">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5995">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5996">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_updated分类、第九次修订、修订修改和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (关键字词典) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5996">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5997">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5997">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-5998">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_codes分类、第九次修订、修订和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (的关键字词典中的) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5998">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-5999">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-5999">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6000">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6000">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6001">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6001">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6002">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6002">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6003">处理 IPv4 地址 (格式) 和无格式 (IPv4) 句点的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6003">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6004">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6004">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6005">包含带格式的 IPv6 号码的复杂 (包括冒号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6005">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6006">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6007">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6008">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6008">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6009">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6010">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6010">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6011">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6011">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6012">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6012">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6013">对于 IPv4，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6013">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6014">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6014">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6015">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6015">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6016">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6016">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6017">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6017">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6018">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6018">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6019">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6019">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6020">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6020">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6021">此 (的 IP 关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6021">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6022">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6022">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6023">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6023">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6024">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6024">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6025">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6025">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6026">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6026">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6027">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6027">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6028">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6028">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6029">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6029">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6030">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6030">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6031">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6031">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6032">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6032">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6033">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6034">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6034">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6035">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6036">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6037">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6037">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6038">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6038">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6162">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6162">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6164">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6164">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6165">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6166">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6166">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6167">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6167">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6168">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6168">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6169">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6170">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6171">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6172">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6173">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6173">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6174">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6175">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字的日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6175">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6176">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6177">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6177">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6178">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6202">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6202">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6203">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6204">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6204">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6205">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6205">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6206">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6206">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6207">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6207">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6208">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6209">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6209">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6210">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6210">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6211">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6211">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6212">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6212">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6213">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6213">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6214">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6214">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6215">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6215">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6216">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6217">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6218">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6219">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6220">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6220">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6221">找到来自Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6221">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6222">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6223">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6223">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6224">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6224">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6225">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6270">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6270">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6271">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6272">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6272">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6273">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6274">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6274">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6275">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6275">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6276">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6276">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6277">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6277">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6278">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6278">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6279">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6279">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6280">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6280">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6281">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6281">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6282">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6283">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6283">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6284">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6285">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6285">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6286">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6286">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6287">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6287">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6288">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6288">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6289">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6289">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6290">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6290">Bank Account Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6292">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6292">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6293">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6293">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6294">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6294">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6295">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6296">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6296">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6297">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6297">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6298">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6298">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6299">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6299">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6300">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6300">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6301">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6301">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6302">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6302">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6303">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6303">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6304">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6304">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6305">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

-   <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6313">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6313">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6324">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6324">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6325">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6325">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6326">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6326">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6327">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6327">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6328">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6328">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6329">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6329">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6330">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6330">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6331">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6331">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6332">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6332">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6333">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6333">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6334">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6334">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6335">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6335">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6336">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6336">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6337">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6338">正则表达式查找 `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6338">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6339">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6339">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6466">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6466">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6467">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6467">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6468">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6468">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6469">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6469">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6470">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6470">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6471">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6471">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6472">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6472">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6474">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6474">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6475">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6476">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6476">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6477">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6477">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6478">三个字母，分别对应名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6478">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6479">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6479">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6480">一个对应于出生日期月份字母的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，January 为 A，10 月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6480">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6481">与出生日期对应的两个数字-为了区分性别，将 40 位添加到女士的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6481">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6482">四个数字，对应于特定的地区代码，该人的 (国家/地区代码用于国家/地区) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6482">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6483">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6483">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6484">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6485">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6485">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6486">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6487">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6488">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6488">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6489">找到 的  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6489">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6490">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6491">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6491">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6526">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6526">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6527">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6528">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6528">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6529">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6530">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6530">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6531">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6531">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6532">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6532">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6533">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6534">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6534">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6535">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6536">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6537">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6537">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6538">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6538">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6539">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6539">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6540">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6540">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6541">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6541">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6542">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6542">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6566">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6566">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6567">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6567">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6568">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6568">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6569">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6569">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6570">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6570">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6571">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6571">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6572">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6572">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6573">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6574">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6574">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6575">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6576">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6576">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6577">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6577">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6578">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6578">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6579">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6579">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6580">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6580">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6581">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6582">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6582">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6583">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6584">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6584">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6585">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6585">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6586">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6586">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6587">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6587">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6588">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6588">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6596">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6596">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6597">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6598">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6598">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6599">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6599">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6600">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6600">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6601">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6601">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6602">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6602">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6603">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6603">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6604">一个空格或 (划线) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6604">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6605">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6605">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6606">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6607">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6607">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6608">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6608">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6609">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6609">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6610">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6610">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6611">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6611">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6612">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6612">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6613">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6613">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6614">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6614">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6615">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6615">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6616">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6616">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6617">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6617">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6664">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6664">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6665">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6665">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6666">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6666">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6667">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6667">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6668">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6668">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6669">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6670">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6670">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6671">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6672">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6672">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6673">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6673">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6674">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6712">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6712">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6713">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6713">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6714">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6714">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6715">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6715">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6716">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6716">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6717">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6717">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6718">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6718">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6719">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6720">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6720">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6721">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6722">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6722">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6723">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6723">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6724">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6724">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6725">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6726">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6727">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6728">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6729">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6729">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6730">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6730">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6731">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6731">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6732">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6732">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6745">日本我的号码 - 个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6745">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6746">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6746">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6747">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6747">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6748">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6748">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6749">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6749">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6750">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6750">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6751">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6751">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6752">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6752">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6753">12 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6753">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6754">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6754">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6755">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6755">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6756">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6756">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6757">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6757">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6758">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6758">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6759">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6759">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6760">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6760">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6761">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6762">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6762">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6763">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6764">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6765">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6765">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6766">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6766">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6767">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6768">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6768">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6774">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6774">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6775">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6775">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6776">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6776">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6777">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6777">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6778">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6778">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6779">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6779">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6780">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6780">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6781">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6781">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6782">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6783">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6783">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6784">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6785">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6785">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6786">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6787">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6787">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6788">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6789">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6789">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6790">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6790">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6791">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6791">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6801">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6801">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6802">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6802">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6803">パスポパスポパスポ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6803">パスポートNo.</span></span>
