## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6808">日本居民身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6808">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6809">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6810">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6810">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6811">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6812">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6812">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6813">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6813">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6814">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6814">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6815">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6815">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6816">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6817">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6817">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6818">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6819">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6819">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6820">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6820">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6821">找到来自Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6821">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6822">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6822">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6823">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6823">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6824">居住地卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6824">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6825">居住卡否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6825">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6826">居住卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6826">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6827">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6827">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6828">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6828">在留カード</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6830">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6830">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6831">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6832">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6832">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6833">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6834">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6834">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6835">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6835">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6836">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6836">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6837">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6837">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6838">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6838">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6839">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6839">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6840">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6840">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6845">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6845">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6846">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6846">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6847">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6847">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6848">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6848">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6853">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6853">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6854">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6855">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6855">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6856">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6856">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6857">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6857">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6858">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6858">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6859">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6859">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6860">六个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6860">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6861">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6861">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6862">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6862">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6863">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6863">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6864">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6864">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6865">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6865">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6866">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6866">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6867">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6867">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6868">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6868">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6869">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6869">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6870">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6870">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6891">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6891">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6892">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6893">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6893">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6894">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6895">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6895">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6896">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6896">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6897">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6897">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6898">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6899">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6899">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-6900">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-6901">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6901">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6902">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6902">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-6903">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-6903">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7028">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7028">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7029">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7030">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7030">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7031">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7032">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7032">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7033">11 个数字和连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7033">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7034">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7034">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7035">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7035">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7036">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"、20 世纪对应"1"和"21 世纪") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7036">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7037">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7037">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7038">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7038">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7039">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7039">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7040">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7040">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7041">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7041">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7042">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7042">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7043">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7043">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7044">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7044">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7045">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7045">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7046">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7046">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7047">找到 的  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7047">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7048">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7048">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7049">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7049">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7112">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7112">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7114">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7114">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7115">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7116">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7116">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7117">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7117">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7118">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7118">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7119">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7120">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7121">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7122">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7123">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7123">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7124">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7125">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7125">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7126">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7126">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7127">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7127">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7128">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7128">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7151">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7151">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7152">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7153">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7153">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7154">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7154">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7155">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7155">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7156">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7157">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7157">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7158">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7159">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7159">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7160">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7160">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7161">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7161">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7286">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7286">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7287">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7287">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7288">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7288">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7289">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7289">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7290">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7290">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7291">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7291">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7292">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7292">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7293">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7294">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7294">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7295">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7295">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7296">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7296">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7297">一个数字 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7297">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7298">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7298">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7299">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7299">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7300">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7300">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7301">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7302">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7302">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7303">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7304">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7305">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7305">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7306">找到 的  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7306">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7307">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7307">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7308">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7308">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7311">asmeninis skaitmeninis kodas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7311">asmeninis skaitmeninis kodas</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7343">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7343">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7344">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7344">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7345">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7345">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7346">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7346">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7347">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7347">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7348">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7348">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7349">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7349">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7350">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7350">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7351">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7351">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7352">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7352">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7353">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7353">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7354">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7354">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7355">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7356">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7356">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7357">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7357">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7377">百度达驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7377">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7379">6 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7379">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7380">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7381">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7381">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7382">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7382">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7383">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7383">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7384">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7384">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7385">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7385">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7386">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7386">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7387">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7387">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7511"> (的自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7511">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7512">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7512">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7513">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7513">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7514">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7514">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7515">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7515">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7516">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7516">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7517">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7517">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7519">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7519">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7520">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7521">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7521">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7522">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7522">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7523">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7523">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7524">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7525">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7525">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7526">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7527">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7527">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7528">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7528">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7529">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7529">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7530">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7530">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7531">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7531">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7554">百里达护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7554">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7555">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7556">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7556">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7557">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7558">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7558">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7559">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7560">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7560">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7561">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7562">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7562">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7563">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7563">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7564">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7564">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7565">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7565">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7566">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7566">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7567">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7567">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7568">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7568">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7600">阿比塞卡 (非自然人的身份证号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7600">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7601">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7602">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7602">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7603">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7604">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7604">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7605">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7605">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7606">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7606">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7607">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7607">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7608">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7608">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7609">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7609">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7610">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7610">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7611">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7611">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7612">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7612">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7613">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7614">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7614">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7615">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7616">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7616">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7617">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7617">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7618">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7618">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7619">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7620">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7620">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7660">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7660">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7662">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7662">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7663">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7664">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7664">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7665">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7665">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7666">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7666">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7667">双字母的出生日期位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7667">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7668">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7668">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7669">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7669">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7670">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7670">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7671">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7672">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7672">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7673">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7674">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7675">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7675">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7676">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7676">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7703">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7703">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7704">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7705">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7705">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7706">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7707">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7707">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7708">两个字符 (数字或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7708">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7709">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7709">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7710">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7710">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7711">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7711">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7712">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7712">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7713">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7714">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7714">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7715">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7716">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7716">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7717">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7717">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7718">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7718">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7842">马耳他身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7842">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7843">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7843">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7844">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7844">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7845">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7845">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7846">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7846">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7847">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7847">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7848">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7848">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7849">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7849">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7850">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7850">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7851">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7851">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7852">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7852">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7853">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7853">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7854">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7854">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7855">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7855">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7856">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7856">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7857">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7857">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7858">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7858">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7859">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7859">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7860">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7860">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7861">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7861">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7862">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7862">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7873">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7873">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7874">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7874">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7879">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7879">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7881">七个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7881">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7882">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7883">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7883">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7884">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7885">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7886">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7887">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7887">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7888">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7888">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7889">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7889">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7890">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7890">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7891">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7891">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7892">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7892">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7893">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7893">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7913">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7913">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7914">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7915">对于马耳他语：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7915">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7916">指定模式中的七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7916">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7917">非马耳他语公民和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7917">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7918">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7918">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7919">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7919">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7920">马耳他语：七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7920">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7921">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7921">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7922">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7922">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7923">非马耳他公民和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7923">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7924">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7924">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7925">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7925">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7926">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7926">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7927">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7927">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7928">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7929">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7929">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7930">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7930">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7931">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7931">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7932">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7932">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7965">一个 MBI (的) 标识符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7965">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7966">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7966">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7967">十二字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7967">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7968">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7968">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7969">1 到 9 之间的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7969">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7970">一个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7970">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7971">一个数字或字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7971">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7972">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7972">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7973">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7973">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7974">一个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7974">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7975">一个数字或字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7975">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7976">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7976">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7977">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7977">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7978">两个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7978">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7979">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7979">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7980">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7981">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7981">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7982">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7983">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7983">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7984">正则表达式查找  `Regex_mbi_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7984">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7985">找到 的  `Keyword_mbi_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7985">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7986">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7987">正则表达式查找  `Regex_mbi_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7987">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7988">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7988">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7989">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7989">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7990">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7990">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7991">mbi#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7991">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7992">一名收入#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7992">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7993">一个优势标识符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7993">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7994">一名受益者否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7994">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7995">一名收入者编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7995">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-7996">一名收入#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7996">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7997">墨西哥唯一总体注册表代码 (CURP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7997">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-7998">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-7999">18 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-7999">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8000">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8000">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8001">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8001">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8002">六个数字，表示有效日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8002">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8003">字母 - H/h 或 M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8003">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8004">指示有效"墨西哥"状态代码的两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8004">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8005">三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8005">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8006">一个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8006">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8007">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8007">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8008">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8009">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8009">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8010">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8011">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8011">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8012">函数  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8012">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8013">找到 的  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8013">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8014">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8014">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8015">函数  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8015">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
