## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8036">荷兰公民服务号码 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8036">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8037">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8038">包含可选空格的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8038">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8039">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8040">八个九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8040">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8041">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8041">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8042">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8042">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8043">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8043">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8044">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8044">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8045">2-3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8045">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8046">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8047">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8047">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8048">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8049">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8049">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8050">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8050">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8051">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8051">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8052">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8052">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8076">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8076">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8078">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8078">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8079">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8080">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8080">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8081">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8082">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8083">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8084">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8084">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8085">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8085">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8086">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8086">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8214">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8214">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8215">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8216">九个字母或数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8216">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8217">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8218">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8218">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8219">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8220">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8220">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8221">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8222">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8222">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8223">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8223">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8224">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8225">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8225">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8226">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8227">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8227">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8228">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8228">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8246">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8246">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8247">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8247">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8248">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8248">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8249">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8249">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8250">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8250">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8251">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8251">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8252">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8252">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8253">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8254">九个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8254">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8255">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8256">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8256">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8257">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8257">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8258">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8258">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8259">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8259">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8260">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8260">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8261">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8261">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8262">找到 的  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8262">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8263">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8263">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8264">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8264">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8302">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8302">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8303">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8303">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8304">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8304">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8305">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8305">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8306">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8306">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8307">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8307">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8308">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8308">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8309">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8310">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8310">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8311">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8312">14 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8312">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8313">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8313">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8314">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8314">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8315">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8315">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8316">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8316">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8317">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8317">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8318">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8318">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8319">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8319">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8320">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8321">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8321">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8322">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8323">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8323">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8324">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8324">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8325">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8325">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8326">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8326">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8327">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8327">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8336">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8336">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8337">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8338">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8339">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8340">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8341">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8342">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8343">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8344">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8344">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8345">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8346">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8346">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8347">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8347">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8348">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8348">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8349">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8349">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8350">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8350">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8351">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8351">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8352">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8352">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8353">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8353">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8354">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8354">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8355">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8355">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8356">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8356">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8357">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8357">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8358">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8358">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8359">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8359">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8360">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8360">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8361">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8362">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8362">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />

        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8370">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8370">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8371">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8371">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8372">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8372">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8373">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8373">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8374">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8374">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8375">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8375">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8376">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8376">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8377">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8378">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8378">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8379">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8380">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8380">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8381">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8381">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8382">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8382">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8383">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8384">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8384">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8385">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8386">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8386">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8387">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8387">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8388">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8388">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8389">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8389">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8390">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8390">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8457">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8457">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8458">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8458">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8459">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8459">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8460">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8460">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8461">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8461">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8462">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8462">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8463">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8463">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8464">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8465">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8465">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8466">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8467">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8467">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8468">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8468">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8469">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8469">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8470">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8470">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8471">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8471">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8472">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8472">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8473">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8474">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8474">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8475">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8476">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8476">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8477">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8477">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8478">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8478">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8479">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8479">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8480">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8480">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8489">新西兰卫生服务局号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8489">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8490">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8491">三个字母，一 (可选) 和四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8491">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8492">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8492">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8493">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8493">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8494">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8494">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8495">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8495">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8496">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8497">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8497">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8498">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8499">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8499">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8500">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8500">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8501">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8501">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8502">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8502">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8503">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8503">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8504">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8504">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8505">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8505">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8518">National Health Index#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8518">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8519">新西兰社会电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8519">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8520">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8520">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8521">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8521">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8522">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8522">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8523">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8523">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8524">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8524">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8525">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8525">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8526">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8526">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8527">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8527">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8528">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8528">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8529">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8529">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8530">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8531">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8531">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8532">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8532">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8533">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8533">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8534">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8534">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8535">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8535">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8536">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8536">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8537">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8537">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8538">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8538">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8539">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8539">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8540">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8540">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8541">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8541">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8542">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8542">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8543">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8543">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8544">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8544">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8545">社交 <2> <2> <3>#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8545">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8546">社交 <2> <2> <3>#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8546">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8547">social一号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8547">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8548">social 时号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8548">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8549">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8549">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8550">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8550">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8551">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8552">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8552">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8553">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8554">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8554">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8555">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8555">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8556">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8556">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8557">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8557">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8558">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8559">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8559">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8560">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8561">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8561">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8562">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8562">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8563">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8563">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8564">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8564">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8565">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8565">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8566">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8566">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8567">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8567">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8568">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8568">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8569">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8569">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8572">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8572">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8573">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8573">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8576">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8576">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8577">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8578">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8578">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8579">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8580">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8580">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8581">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8581">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8582">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8582">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8583">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8583">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8584">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8584">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8585">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8585">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8586">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8586">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8587">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8587">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8588">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8588">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8589">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8589">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8590">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8590">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8591">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8591">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8592">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8592">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8593">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8593">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8594">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8594">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8595">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8595">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8596">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8596">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8597">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8597">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8598">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8598">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8599">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8600">14 个数字，包含两个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8600">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8601">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8602">14 个数字和两个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8602">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8603">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8603">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8604">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8604">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8605">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8605">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8606">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8606">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8607">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8607">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8608">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8608">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8609">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8609">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8610">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8610">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8611">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8611">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8612">正则表达式查找  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8612">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8613">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8613">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8737">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8737">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8738">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8739">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8739">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8740">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8741">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8741">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8742">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8743">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8743">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8744">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8745">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8745">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8746">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8746">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8747">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8747">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8748">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8748">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8749">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8749">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8750">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8750">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8753">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8753">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8754">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8754">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8755">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8755">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8756">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8756">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-p142">dow. os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8759">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8759">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8760">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8760">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8761">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8761">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8762">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8762">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8763">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8763">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8764">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8764">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8765">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8765">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8766">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8767">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8767">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8768">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8769">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8769">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8770">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8770">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8771">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8771">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8772">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8773">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8773">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8774">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8774">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8775">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8775">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8777">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8777">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8780">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8780">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8781">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8781">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8782">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8782">nr.-pesel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8785">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8785">pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8787">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8787">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8788">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8788">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8789">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8789">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8790">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8791">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8791">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8792">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8793">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8793">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8794">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8794">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8795">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8795">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8796">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8796">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8797">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8797">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8798">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8798">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8799">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8799">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8800">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8800">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8801">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8801">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8802">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8802">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8803">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8803">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8804">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8804">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8805">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8805">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8806">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8806">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8807">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8807">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8808">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8819">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8819">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8820">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8820">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8821">Keyword_polish_national_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8821">Keyword_polish_national_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8822">numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8822">numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8823">numery paszportów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8823">numery paszportów</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8824">numery paszportowe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8824">numery paszportowe</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8826">nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8826">nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8827">paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8827">paszportu</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8834">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8834">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8835">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8836">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8837">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8838">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8839">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8840">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8841">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8842">9 位数字或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8842">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8843">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8844">九位数字或 14 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8844">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8845">九个数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8845">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8846">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8846">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8847">hyphen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8847">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8848">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8848">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8849">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8850">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8850">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8851">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8852">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8852">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8853">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8853">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8854">找到来自Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8854">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8855">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8855">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8856">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8856">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8858">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8858">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8859">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8859">regon id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8860">统计数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8860">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8861">统计 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8861">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8862">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8862">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8863">regon number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8863">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8864">reg一维#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8864">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8865">regonno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8865">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8866">公司 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8866">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8867">companyid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8867">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8868">companyidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8868">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8869">numer statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8869">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8870">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8870">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8871">numerstatystyczny#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8871">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8873">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8873">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8874">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8874">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8875">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8875">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8876">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8876">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8877">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8877">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8878">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8878">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8879">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8879">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8881">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8881">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8882">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8883">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8883">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8884">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8885">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8885">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8886">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8887">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8887">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8888">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8888">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8889">找到 的  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8889">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8919">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8919">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8920">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8920">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8921">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8921">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8922">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8922">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8923">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8923">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8924">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8924">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8925">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8925">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8926">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8926">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8927">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8927">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8928">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8928">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8929">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8929">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
