## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8949">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8949">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8950">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8951">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8951">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8952">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8953">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8953">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8954">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8954">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8955">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8955">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8956">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8956">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8957">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8957">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8958">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8958">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8959">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字（带特殊字符）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8959">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8960">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8960">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8961">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8961">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8962">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8962">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8963">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8963">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8964">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8964">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8965">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8966">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8966">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-8967">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-8968">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8968">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8969">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8969">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-8970">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-8970">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9102">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9102">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9103">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9103">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9104">一个字母后跟 6 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9104">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9105">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9105">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9106">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9106">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9107">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9107">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9108">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9108">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9109">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9110">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9110">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9111">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9112">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9112">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9113">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9113">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9114">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9114">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9115">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9115">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9116">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9116">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9117">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9117">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9118">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9118">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9145">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9145">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9146">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9147">九个数字（带可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9147">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9148">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9148">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9149">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9149">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9150">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9150">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9151">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9152">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9152">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9153">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9153">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9154">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9155">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9155">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9156">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9157">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9157">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9158">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9158">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9159">找到 的  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9159">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9160">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9160">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9161">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9161">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9186">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9186">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9187">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9188">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9188">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9189">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9190">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9190">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9191">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9191">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9192">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9192">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9193">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9193">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9194">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9194">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9195">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9195">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9196">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9196">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9197">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9197">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9198">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9198">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9326">使用 CNP (罗马尼亚个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9326">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9327">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9327">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9328">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9328">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9329">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9329">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9330">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9330">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9331">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9331">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9332">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9332">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9333">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9334">不带空格和分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9334">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9335">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9335">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9336">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9336">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9337">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9337">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9338">两个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9338">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9339">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9339">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9340">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9341">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9341">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9342">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9343">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9343">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9344">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9344">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9345">找到 的  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9345">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9346">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9346">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9347">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9347">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9398">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9398">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9399">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9399">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9400">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9400">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9401">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9401">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9402">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9402">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9403">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9404">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9404">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9405">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9406">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9406">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9407">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9407">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9408">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9408">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9409">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例- 01 2 月/2 月 10) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9409">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9410">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9410">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9411">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9411">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9412">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9412">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9426">numrul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9426">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9430">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9430">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9431">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9432">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9433">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9434">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9434">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9435">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9435">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9436">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9437">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9438">10 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9438">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9439">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9440">10 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9440">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9441">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9441">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9442">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9442">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9443">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9443">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9444">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9444">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9445">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9445">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9446">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9446">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9447">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9447">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9448">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9448">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9449">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9449">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9450">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9450">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9451">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9451">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9482">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9485">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9485">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9486">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9486">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9487">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9487">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9504">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9504">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9505">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9506">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9506">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9507">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9508">10 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9508">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9509">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9510">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9511">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9512">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9512">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9513">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9513">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9514">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9514">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9515">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9515">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9516">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9516">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9517">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9517">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9518">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9518">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9519">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9519">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9520">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9520">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9521">新加坡国家注册身份证号码 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9521">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9522">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9522">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9523">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9523">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9524">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9524">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9525">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9525">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9526">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9526">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9527">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9527">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9528">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9528">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9530">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9532">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9533">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9533">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9534">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9534">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9535">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9536">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9536">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9537">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9537">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9538">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9542">Identity Card Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9542">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9543">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9543">NRIC</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9549">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9549">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9550">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9551">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9551">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9552">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9553">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9553">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9554">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9554">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9555">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9555">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9556">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9557">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9557">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9558">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9559">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9559">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9560">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9560">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9561">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9561">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9687">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9687">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9688">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9689">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9690">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9691">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9692">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9693">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9694">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9695">九个或十个数字，包含可选反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9695">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9696">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9696">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9697">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9697">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9698">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9698">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9699">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9699">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9700">一个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9700">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9701">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9702">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9702">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9703">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9704">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9705">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9705">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9706">找到 的  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9706">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9707">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9707">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9708">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9708">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9755">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9755">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9757">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9757">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9759">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9759">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9760">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9761">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9761">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9762">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9763">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9764">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9764">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9765">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9765">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9766">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9766">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9767">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9768">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9768">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9769">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9769">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9783">ííslo pasu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9783">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9791">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9791">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9793">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9793">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9794">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9795">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9795">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9796">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9797">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9797">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9798">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9799">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9799">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9800">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9800">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9801">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9801">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9928">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9928">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9929">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9929">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9930">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9930">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9931">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9931">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9932">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9932">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9933">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9933">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9934">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9934">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9935">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9936">不带空格或分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9936">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9937">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9938">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9938">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9939">对应于出生日期的七个数字 (DDMMLLL) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9939">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9940">两个数字，对应于出生日期"50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9940">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9941">三个数字，分别对应同一天男性的性别和序列号组合 (000-499 和 500-999（对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9941">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9942">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9942">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9943">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9944">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9944">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9945">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9946">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9946">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9947">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9947">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9948">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9948">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9949">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9950">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9950">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9978">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9978">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9979">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9979">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9980">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9980">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9981">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9981">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9982">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9982">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9983">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9983">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9984">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9984">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9985">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9985">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9986">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9987">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9987">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-9988">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9989">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9989">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9990">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9990">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9991">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9991">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9992">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9992">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-9993">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9994">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9994">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-9995">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-9995">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10018">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10018">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10019">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10019">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10020">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10020">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10021">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10021">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10022">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10022">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10023">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10023">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10024">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10024">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10025">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10026">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10026">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10027">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10027">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10028">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10028">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10029">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10029">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10030">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10030">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10031">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10032">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10032">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10033">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10034">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10034">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10035">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10035">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10036">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10036">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10037">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10037">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10038">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10038">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10062">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10062">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10063">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10064">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10064">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10065">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10066">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10066">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10067">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10067">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10068">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10068">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10069">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10069">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10070">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10070">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10071">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10071">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10072">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10073">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10073">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10074">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10075">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10075">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10076">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10076">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10077">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10077">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10078">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10078">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10079">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10079">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10080">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10080">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10084">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10084">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10085">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10086">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10086">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10087">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10088">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10088">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10089">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10089">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10090">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10090">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10091">一个数字，由世纪和性别决定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10091">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10092">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10092">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10093">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10093">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10094">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10094">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10095">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10096">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10096">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10097">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10098">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10098">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10099">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10099">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10100">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10100">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10101">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10101">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10102">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10102">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10103">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10103">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10104">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10104">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10105">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10105">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10106">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10106">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10107">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10107">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10108">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10108">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10109">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10109">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10110">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10110">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10111">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10111">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10112">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10112">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10114">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10114">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10115">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10116">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10116">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10117">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10117">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10118">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10118">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10119">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10120">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10120">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10121">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10122">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10123">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10123">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10124">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10125">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10125">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10126">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10126">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
