## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10260">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10260">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10261">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10262">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10263">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10264">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10265">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10266">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10267">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10268">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10268">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10269">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10270">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10270">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10271">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10271">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10272">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10272">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10273">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10273">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10274">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10275">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10276">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10277">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10277">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10278">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10278">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10279">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10279">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10280">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10280">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10281">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10281">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10305">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10305">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10306">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10307">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10307">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10308">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10309">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10309">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10310">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10310">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10311">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10311">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10312">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10312">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10313">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10313">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10314">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10314">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10315">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10315">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10316">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10316">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10317">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10317">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10318">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10318">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10319">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10319">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10320">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10320">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10321">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10321">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10322">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10322">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10351">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10351">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10352">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10353">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10353">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10354">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10355">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10355">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10356">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10356">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10357">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10357">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10358">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10358">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10359">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10359">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10360">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10360">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10361">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10362">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10363">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10364">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10365">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10365">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10366">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10366">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10367">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10367">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10368">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10368">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10369">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10369">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10370">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10370">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10379">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10379">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10380">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10380">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10381">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10381">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10382">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10382">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10383">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10383">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10384">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10384">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10385">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10385">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10386">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10387">七个或八个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10387">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10388">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10389">具有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10389">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10390">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10390">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10391">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10392">没有西班牙国家身份证的非常驻 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10392">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10393">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10393">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10394">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10395">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10396">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童的常驻 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10396">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10397">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10397">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10398">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10398">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10399">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10399">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10400">具有一位用户标识号的百位用户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10400">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10401">一个小写字母，"X"、"Y"或"Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10401">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10402">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10402">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10403">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10403">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10404">没有标识号的百分卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10404">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10405">一个区分大小写的大写字母 ("M") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10405">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10406">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10406">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10407">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10407">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10408">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10409">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10409">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10410">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10411">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10412">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10412">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10413">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10413">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10414">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10414">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10415">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10415">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10446">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10446">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10447">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10448">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10448">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10449">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10449">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10450">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10450">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10451">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10451">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10452">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10452">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10453">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10453">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10454">任何不是美元符号的字符 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10454">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10455">7-128 个字符的任意组合，这些字符不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10455">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10456">分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10456">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10457">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10458">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10459">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10460">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10460">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10461">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10461">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10462">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10462">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10463">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10463">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10464">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10464">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10472"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10472">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10492">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10492">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10493">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10494">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10494">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10495">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10496">包含连字符的十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10496">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10497">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10497">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10498">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10498">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10499">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10499">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10500">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10501">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10501">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10502">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10503">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10503">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10504">正则表达式查找  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10504">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10505">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10505">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10638">瑞典国家/身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10638">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10639">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10640">10 个或 12 个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10640">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10641">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10642">10 或 12 位数字和可选的分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10642">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10643">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10643">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10644">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10644">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10645">可选参数"-"或"+" () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10645">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10646">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10646">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10647">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10648">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10648">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10649">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10650">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10650">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10651">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10651">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10652">找到的 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10652">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10653">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10653">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10654">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10654">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10655">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10655">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10656">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10656">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10675">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10675">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10676">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10677">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10677">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10678">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10679">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10679">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10680">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10681">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10682">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10683">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10683">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10684">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10684">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10685">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10685">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10686">正则表达式查找 `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10686">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10687">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10687">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10688">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10688">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10689">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10689">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10690">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10690">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10691">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10691">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10692">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10692">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10693">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10693">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10694">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10694">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10695">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10695">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10696">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10696">passportno</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10725">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10725">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10726">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10726">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10727">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10727">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10728">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10728">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10729">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10729">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10730">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10730">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10731">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10731">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10733">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10733">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10734">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10735">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10735">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10736">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10736">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10737">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10737">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10738">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10738">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10739">对于 1990 以前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或出生日期的县</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10739">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10740">第九个位置的数字表示性别（男性为奇数或偶数）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10740">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10741">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10741">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10742">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10743">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10743">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10744">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10745">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10745">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10746">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10746">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10747">找到 的  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10747">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10748">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10749">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10749">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10775">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10775">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10776">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10777">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10777">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10778">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10779">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10779">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10780">四个字母银行 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10780">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10781">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10781">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10782">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10782">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10783">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10783">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10784">BBAN (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10784">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10785">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10786">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10786">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10787">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10788">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10788">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10789">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10789">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10790">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10790">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10820">SWIFT コド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10820">SWIFT コード</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10827">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10827">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10828">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10828">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10829">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10829">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10830">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10830">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10831">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10831">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10832">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10832">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10833">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10833">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10834">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10834">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10835">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10835">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10836">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10837">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10837">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10838">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10838">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10839">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10839">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10840">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10840">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10841">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10841">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10842">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10842">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10843">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10843">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10844">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10844">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10845">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10846">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10846">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10847">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10848">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10848">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10849">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10849">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10850">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10850">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10851">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10851">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10852">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10852">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10861">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10861">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10862">个人标识号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10862">personal identification no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10863">insuranceno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10863">insuranceno#</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10873">台湾国家/地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10873">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10874">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10874">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10875">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10875">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10876">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10876">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10877">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10877">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10878">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10878">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10879">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10879">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10880">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10880">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10881">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10881">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10882">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10882">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10883">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10883">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10884">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10884">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10885">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10885">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10886">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10886">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10887">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10887">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10888">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10888">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10889">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10889">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10890">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10890">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10892">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10892">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10894">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10894">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10895">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10895">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10896">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10896">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10897">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10897">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10898">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10898">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10899">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10899">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10900">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10900">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10901">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10901">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10902">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10902">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10903">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10903">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10904">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10904">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10905">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10905">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10906">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10906">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10907">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10907">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10908">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10908">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10909">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10909">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10910">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10910">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10911">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10911">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10912">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10912">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10913">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10913">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10914">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10914">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10915">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10915">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10916">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10916">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10917">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10918">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10919">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10920">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10921">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10921">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10922">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10922">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10923">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10924">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10924">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10925">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10925">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10926">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10926">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10927">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10927">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10928">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10928">Passport Num</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10933">中国台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10933">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10934">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10935">10 letters and digits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10935">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10936">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10937">10 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10937">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10938">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10938">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10939">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10939">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10940">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10941">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10942">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10943">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10944">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10944">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10945">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10945">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10948">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10948">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10949">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10949">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10950">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10950">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10951">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10951">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10952">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10952">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10953">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10953">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10954">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10954">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10955">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10955">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10956">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10956">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10957">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10957">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10958">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10958">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10959">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10959">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10960">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10961">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10961">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10962">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10963">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10963">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10964">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10964">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10965">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10965">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10966">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10966">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10967">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10967">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10968">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10968">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10969">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10969">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10970">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10970">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10971">找到来自Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10971">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10972">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10972">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10973">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10973">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10976">ID 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10976">ID Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10978">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10978">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10979">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10979">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10980">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10980">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10981">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10981">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10982">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10982">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10983">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10984">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10984">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10985">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10986">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10986">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10987">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10988">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10988">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10989">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10990">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10991">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10991">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10992">找到来自Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10992">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-10993">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10994">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10994">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10995">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10995">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-10996">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10996">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10997">TC Kim且否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10997">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10998">TC Kim且 nu一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10998">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-10999">Vatandailal？k nu一s？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-10999">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11001">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11001">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11002">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11002">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11003">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11004">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11004">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11005">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11006">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11006">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11007">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11007">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11008">一个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11008">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11009">日期格式 MMDDY 表示出生日期的五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11009">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11010">如果驱动程序是男性，则第七个字符将递增 50;对于考试，51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11010">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11011">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11011">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11012">五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11012">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11013">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11013">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11014">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11014">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11015">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11015">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11016">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11016">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11017">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11017">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11018">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11018">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11019">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11019">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11020">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11020">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11021">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11021">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11022">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11022">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11023">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11023">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11024">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11024">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11025">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11025">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11026">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11026">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11027">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11027">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11028">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11028">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11029">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11029">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11030">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11030">driverlicences</span></span>
