## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11143">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11143">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11144">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11144">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11145">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11146">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11146">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11147">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11148">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11148">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11149">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11150">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11150">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11151">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11152">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11152">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11153">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11153">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11154">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11154">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11155">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11155">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11156">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11156">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11157">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11157">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11158">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11158">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11159">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11159">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11160">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11160">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11161">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11161">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11162">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11162">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11164">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11164">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11165">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11166">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11166">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11167">3 个或 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11167">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11168">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11168">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11169">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11169">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11170">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11170">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11171">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11171">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11173">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11175">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11175">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11176">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11176">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11177">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11177">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11178">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11178">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11179">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11179">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11180">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11180">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11181">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11181">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11199">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11199">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11200">NINO 保险号码 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11200">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11201">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11201">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11202">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11202">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11203">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11204">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11204">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11205">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11206">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11206">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11207">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11207">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11208">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11208">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11209">"A"、B、C 或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11209">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11210">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11210">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11211">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11211">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11212">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11212">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11213">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11213">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11214">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11214">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11215">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11215">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11216">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11216">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11217">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11217">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11218">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11218">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11219">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11219">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11220">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11221">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11222">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11223">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11223">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11224">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11224">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11225">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11225">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11226">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11227">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11227">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11249">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11249">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11250">唯一的纳税参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11250">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11251">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11251">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11252">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11252">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11253">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11253">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11254">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11254">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11255">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11255">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11256">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11256">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11257">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11258">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11258">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11259">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11260">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11260">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11261">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11262">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11262">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11263">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11264">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11264">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11265">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11265">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11266">找到 的  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11266">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11267">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11267">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11268">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11268">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11269">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11269">tax number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11272">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11272">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11286">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11286">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11287">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11288">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11288">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11289">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11290">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11290">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11291">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11292">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11293">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11294">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11295">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11295">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11296">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11296">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11326">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11326">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11328">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11328">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11329">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11330">取决于州 -例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11330">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11331">9 个数字，格式为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11331">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11332">9 个数字（如 ddddddddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11332">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11333">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11334">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11334">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11335">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11336">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11336">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11337">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11337">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11338">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11338">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11339">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11339">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11340">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11340">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11341">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11341">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11342">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11342">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11343">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11343">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11344">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11344">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11442">ITIN 中美国个人纳税 (标识号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11442">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11443">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11444">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11444">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11445">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11446">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11446">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11447">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11447">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11448">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11448">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11449">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11449">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11450">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11450">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11451">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11451">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11452">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11452">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11453">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11453">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11454">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11454">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11455">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11455">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11456">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11456">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11457">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11457">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11458">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11458">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11459">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11460">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11460">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11461">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11462">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11462">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11463">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11463">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11464">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11464">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11465">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11466">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11466">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11467">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11467">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11468">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11468">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11469">函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11469">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11470">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11470">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11471">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11471">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11472">将</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11472">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11473">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11473">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11474">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11474">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11475">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11475">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11476">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11476">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11477">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11477">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11478">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11478">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11479">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11479">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11480">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11480">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11481">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11481">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11482">已</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11482">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11483">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11483">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11484">SSN (美国社会保险) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11484">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11486">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11486">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11487">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11487">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11488">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11489">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11489">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11490">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11490">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11491">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11491">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11493">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11493">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11494">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11495">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11495">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11496">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11497">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11497">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11498">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11498">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11499">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11499">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11500">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11501">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11501">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11502">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11502">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11503">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11503">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11504">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11504">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11505">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11505">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11506">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11506">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11507">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11507">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11508">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11508">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11523">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11523">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11524">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11524">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11525">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11526">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11526">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11527">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11528">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11528">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11530">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11530">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11532">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11533">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11533">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11534">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11534">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11535">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11535">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11536">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11536">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11537">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11537">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11538">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11538">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11555">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11556">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11557">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11558">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11559">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11559">records management</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11562">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11562">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11563">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11564">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11564">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11565">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11565">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11567">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30a34-11568">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11568">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11569">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11569">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="30a34-11570">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11570">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11586">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11586">Format</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="30a34-11598">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30a34-11598">Keywords</span></span>
